text:
The Monitor
The Monitor is your main hub for information pertaining to your TARDIS, displaying data such as the time in flight, ETA, stored energy, the destination, location, and more.
The monitor has three buttons, the power button (Located in the top-right of the screen), Previous Page button (Located in the botton-left of the screen), and the Next Page button (Located in the bottom-right of the screen)
Each monitor page displays its own information, there are pages dedicated to the destination info, location info, and even a pre-flight checklist
